content: crochet market bag pattern by jf yarn worsted weight cotton 3 2oz balls of worsted 4 ply like peaches and cream hook us size g/4 25 mm foundation 1 chain 4 slip_stitch into first chain to create ring round one 2 chain 3 double_crochet 11 times into the circle slip_stitch into chain3 from beginning of round round two 3 chain 3 double_crochet into space between chain3 and the first double_crochet from previous round chain 1 *double_crochet into space between stitches from previous round chain 1 * 11 times slip_stitch into chain3 that the round began with round three basic trellis stitch 4 *chain 4 skip next stitch slip_stitch into next stitch* 12 times round four 5 mark first loop as beginning of round for future reference each time you slip_stitch into the loop bearing the marker move the marker to the new loop just created to mark the beginning of each new round 6 *chain 4 slip_stitch into center of next chain loop * 12 times round five 7 * chain 4 slip_stitch into center of next chain loop 4 times increase chain 4 slip stitch into same chain loop as previous slip_stitch * 3 times rounds six 8 *chain 4 slip_stitch into center of next chain loop * 15 times round seven 9 * chain 4 slip_stitch into center of next chain loop 4 times increase chain 4 slip stitch into same chain loop as previous slip_stitch * repeat **3 times then repeat 4 times to end of round round eight 10 *chain 4 slip_stitch into center of next chain loop * 18 times round nine 11 chain 4 *5 single_crochet into next chain loop* 19 times round ten 12 chain 5 skip 2 stitches slip_stitch into next stitch *chain 5 skip 4 slip_stitch in next stitch* 20 times round eleven 13 * chain 4 slip_stitch into center of next chain loop 3 times increase chain 4 slip stitch into same chain loop as previous slip_stitch * repeat **6 times then repeat 2 times to end of round round twelve 14 *chain 4 slip_stitch into center of next chain loop * 26 times round thirteen 15 * chain 4 slip_stitch into center of next chain loop 4 times increase chain 4 slip stitch into same chain loop as previous slip_stitch * repeat **6 times then repeat 2 times to end of round round fourteen 16 *chain 4 slip_stitch into center of next chain loop *32 times round fifteen 17 chain 1 2 single_crochet into the same loop as the last slip_stitch *5 single_crochet into next chain loop* 31 times round sixteen 18 single_crochet each stitch round seventeen begin the sides 19 single_crochet into the next stitch *chain 4 skip 4 slip_stitch into next stitch * 31 times to complete the round chain 4 and slip_stitch into the center of the chain loop the first one created in this round rounds eighteen fifty 20 *chain 4 slip_stitch into center of next chain loop * 31 times note the 31st repeat
